itunes:summary:
Alex Epstein, author of 'Fossil Future: Why Global Human Flourishing Requires More Oil, Coal, and Natural Gas--Not Less', joins the show to discuss why humanity needs to lean into fossil fuels for the betterment of the planet, why green energy isn't ready for primetime yet, and how bizarrely the left-wing media portrays because of his beliefs.
